text: @JeremyVineOn5 @Lord_Sugar @theJeremyVine And it's attitudes like that, that cause the problems. Sugar must have lost millions... Who gives a shit. The sooner people get their arses in gear and follow the most basic of rules, COVID19 ends and people like myself can travel again. #guernsey #notallaboutyou
